## StandardTechniqueParams.color property

Color of the feature in hexadecimal or CSS-style notation, for example: `"#e4e9ec"`<!-- -->, `"#fff"`<!-- -->, `"rgb(255, 0, 0)"`<!-- -->, or `"hsl(35, 11%, 88%)"`<!-- -->. See https://threejs.org/docs/\#api/en/materials/MeshStandardMaterial.color.  color-hex

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
color?: DynamicProperty<StyleColor>;
```
